TopicTitle: [1.8.x] DMagic Orbital Science: New Science Parts [v1.4.3] [11/2/2019]

Articles.Content: @EngineeringEnjoyer All the experiments are available in native DMOS parts, having USII installed (which works fine with 1.12 in my experience) adds wedge shaped alternatives for many of the experiments.
So I don't need to have US2 installed. Thanks.
